lead_paragraph: With debate growing over the safety of holding the Olympics in Brazil amid the ongoing Zika virus outbreak, the World Health Organization's Emergency Committee on Zika will meet in the coming weeks to evaluate the risks tied to going on with the Games in August, a WHO spokeswoman said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: WHO Emergency Panel to Meet in June on Zika and Olympics: Spokeswoman
headline.main: WHO Emergency Panel to Meet in June on Zika and Olympics: Spokeswoman
